events.message: Customer reported a collision involving their car and a utility pole during the early morning hours.
The claim was categorized under 'Auto Accident' following keyword confirmation related to vehicle collision.
An agent was assigned to handle the claim and to communicate with the customer about next steps.
Acknowledgement message was sent to the customer confirming receipt of auto accident claim.
Customer was requested to submit police report and photos of vehicle damage for further evaluation.
All requested documents, including police report and vehicle damage images, were submitted by the customer.
Investigation initiated to assess fault and extent of damage resulting from the car accident.
Investigation was completed confirming the collision details and verifying insurance coverage applicability.
A settlement amount covering the repair costs and temporary vehicle rental was proposed to the customer.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and the assistance provided throughout the process.
The claim was officially approved after verifying all required conditions and documentation were met.
Payment covering repair costs and rental fees was issued to the customerâ€™s designated account.
The auto accident claim was closed following successful settlement payment and customer confirmation.
All claim documents and case files were archived for future reference and compliance auditing purposes.
